title: Add new admin principal alongside existing admins in both draft and production

requirements.text: Ensure the principal `fxms2-qslpu-4ybaz-kouy4-mpule-mqqq5-7grvy-gyikf-o6pvz-zqvgd-hqe` is granted admin privileges in the existing backend admin system, without removing or replacing any existing admins.

quotes: this new admin be added in addition to the existing admins, and both draft and production

acceptanceCriteria: Existing admins remain admins after the change (no admin principals are removed).
When authenticated as `fxms2-qslpu-4ybaz-kouy4-mpule-mqqq5-7grvy-gyikf-o6pvz-zqvgd-hqe`, the backend `checkIfCallerIsAdmin()` returns `true`.

requirements.text: Apply the admin addition for principal `fxms2-qslpu-4ybaz-kouy4-mpule-mqqq5-7grvy-gyikf-o6pvz-zqvgd-hqe` in both environments: the draft canister deployment and the production canister deployment.

quotes: this new admin be added in addition to the existing admins, and both draft and production

acceptanceCriteria: In the draft deployment, `fxms2-qslpu-4ybaz-kouy4-mpule-mqqq5-7grvy-gyikf-o6pvz-zqvgd-hqe` has admin access.
In the production deployment, `fxms2-qslpu-4ybaz-kouy4-mpule-mqqq5-7grvy-gyikf-o6pvz-zqvgd-hqe` has admin access.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in `backend/main.mo`.
Do not modify any frontend files under `frontend/src/components/ui` or the immutable hook/entrypoint paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not redesign or modify the Admin UI/UX beyond what is necessary to support the backend admin addition.
Do not implement new authentication methods beyond Internet Identity.
Do not add new unrelated property/inquiry features.
